mapper.select: select a.*, d.*, f.*,u.name from adopt a left join adopt_form f on a.applicationNo=f.applicationNo join dog d on a.dogCode=d.dogCode join user u on a.applicant=u.id where a.applicationNo=#{applicationNo};
mapper.insert: insert into counseling(reserveNo, counselingDate, counselingTime, dogCode, client, reservedDate) values(#{applicationNo},#{counselingDate},#{counselingTime},#{dogCode},#{applicant},now())
